Key.Original: El Coche Ligero Todoterreno (CLTT) Santana Aníbal PS-10 fue seleccionado en 2004 como vehículo todoterreno de 1 tonelada métrica de carga útil de "necesaria uniformidad en las Fuerzas Armadas" por el Ministerio de Defensa.El primer contrato de compra de estos vehículos destinados al Ejército del Tierra data de febrero de 2005, 150 unidades carrozadas con caja de carga general y techo de lona por importe de 4,23 millones de euros.
Key.Chinese: The Car Slight All-terrain vehicle (CLTT) Santana Aníbal PS-10 was selected in 2004 as vehicle all-terrain vehicle of 1 metric ton of useful load of "necessary uniformity in the Armed forces" for the Ministry of Defensa.El first contract of purchase of these vehicles dedicated to the Army of the Earth it dates of February of 2005, 150 units carrozadas with box of general load and canvas roof for amount of 4,23 million Eurus.
Key.French: L'Affront de Voiture véhicule Tout-terrain (CLTT) Santana Aníbal PS-10 a été sélectionné en premier en 2004 comme véhicule véhicule tout-terrain de 1 tonne métrique de charge utile de "uniformité nécessaire dans les forces Armées" pour le Ministère de Defensa.El contractez d'achat de ces véhicules consacré à l'Armée du Monde qu'il date de février de 2005, 150 carrozadas des unités avec boîte de charge générale et toit de la toile pour montant de 4,23 million d'Eurus.
Key.Spanish: El Coche Ligero Todoterreno (CLTT) Santana Aníbal PS-10 fue seleccionado en 2004 como vehículo todoterreno de 1 tonelada métrica de carga útil de "necesaria uniformidad en las Fuerzas Armadas" por el Ministerio de Defensa.El primer contrato de compra de estos vehículos destinados al Ejército del Tierra data de febrero de 2005, 150 unidades carrozadas con caja de carga general y techo de lona por importe de 4,23 millones de euros.
Key.Italian: La Macchina Disdegna veicolo di Tutto-terreno (CLTT) Santana Aníbal PS-10 fu selezionato nel 2004 come veicolo di tutto-terreno di veicolo di 1 tonnellata metrica di carico utile della "uniformità necessaria nelle forze Armate" per il Ministero di Defensa.El prima contragga di acquisto di questi veicoli dedicato all'Esercito della Terra che è insieme di febbraio di 2005, 150 carrozadas delle unità con scatola di carico generale e tetto di tela per ammontare di 4,23 milioni di Eurus.
Key.Hungarian: The Car Slight All-terrain vehicle (CLTT) Santana Aníbal PS-10 was selected in 2004 as vehicle all-terrain vehicle of 1 metric ton of useful load of "necessary uniformity in the Armed forces" for the Ministry of Defensa.El first contract of purchase of these vehicles dedicated to the Army of the Earth it dates of February of 2005, 150 units carrozadas with box of general load and canvas roof for amount of 4,23 million Eurus.
Key.Polish: The Car Slight All-terrain vehicle (CLTT) Santana Aníbal PS-10 was selected in 2004 as vehicle all-terrain vehicle of 1 metric ton of useful load of "necessary uniformity in the Armed forces" for the Ministry of Defensa.El first contract of purchase of these vehicles dedicated to the Army of the Earth it dates of February of 2005, 150 units carrozadas with box of general load and canvas roof for amount of 4,23 million Eurus.
Key.Russian: The Car Slight All-terrain vehicle (CLTT) Santana Aníbal PS-10 was selected in 2004 as vehicle all-terrain vehicle of 1 metric ton of useful load of "necessary uniformity in the Armed forces" for the Ministry of Defensa.El first contract of purchase of these vehicles dedicated to the Army of the Earth it dates of February of 2005, 150 units carrozadas with box of general load and canvas roof for amount of 4,23 million Eurus.
Key.German: Das Auto kränkt All-terrain Fahrzeug (CLTT), Santana Aníbal PS-10 wurde 2004 geländegängiges Fahrzeug von 1 metrischen Tonnen von nützlicher Last "notwendiger Gleichförmigkeit in den Streitkräften" als Fahrzeug für das Ministerium von Defensa.El ausgewählt, ziehen Sie sich von Kauf dieser Fahrzeuge zuerst zusammen, gewidmet zur Armee der Erde, die es vom Februar 2005 datiert, 150 Dosen von carrozadas mit Kiste von allgemeiner Last und Leinwanddach für Menge von 4,23 Millionen Eurus.
Key.Czech: The Car Slight All-terrain vehicle (CLTT) Santana Aníbal PS-10 was selected in 2004 as vehicle all-terrain vehicle of 1 metric ton of useful load of "necessary uniformity in the Armed forces" for the Ministry of Defensa.El first contract of purchase of these vehicles dedicated to the Army of the Earth it dates of February of 2005, 150 units carrozadas with box of general load and canvas roof for amount of 4,23 million Eurus.
Key.English: The Car Slight All-terrain vehicle (CLTT) Santana Aníbal PS-10 was selected in 2004 as vehicle all-terrain vehicle of 1 metric ton of useful load of "necessary uniformity in the Armed forces" for the Ministry of Defensa.El first contract of purchase of these vehicles dedicated to the Army of the Earth it dates of February of 2005, 150 units carrozadas with box of general load and canvas roof for amount of 4,23 million Eurus.
Key.Japanese: サンタナ アニバル PS-10 は国防省による一トン級の"軍での統一"された車両として、2004 年に採用された軽量な全地形対応車両である。陸軍は 2005 年 2 月、最初の契約で 150 ユニットを 4,23 百万ユーロで契約した。
